title: Did Marjorie Taylor Greene Call Capitol Metal Detectors a Form of ‘Voter Suppression’?
subtitle: The machines to screen people entering the U.S. House chamber were installed after an insurrection on Jan. 6, 2021.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: On March 2, 2021, U.S. Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene called the practice of going through metal detectors in the U.S. House a form of voter suppression.
